sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography } from '@mui/material';

const Hero = () => (
  <Box sx={{
    height: '60vh',
    backgroundImage: 'url(em)',
    backgroundSize: 'cover',
    backgroundPosition: 'center',
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    alignItems: 'center',
    color: 'white',
    textAlign: 'center',
    p: 3,
  }}>
    <Typography variant="h2" gutterBottom>
      Welcome to the Employee Management System
    </Typography>
    <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
      Streamline your employee management process with ease.
    </Typography>
    <Box sx={{ mt: 4 }}>
      <Typography variant="h6">About Employment and Company Performance</Typography>
      <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
        Our company is committed to providing excellent employment opportunities and fostering a culture of performance and growth. We believe in empowering our employees to achieve their best and contribute to the success of the organization.
      </Typography>
    </Box>
  </Box>
);

export default Hero;
